conditions.name: Flu
conditions.careAdvice: Antivirals require a prescription and are time‑sensitive; contact a clinician promptly if high risk or severe symptoms.
conditions.careAdvice_Fr: Les antiviraux nécessitent une ordonnance et sont sensibles au temps ; contactez rapidement un clinicien si risque élevé ou symptômes sévères.
conditions.careAdvice_Ar: الأدوية المضادّة للفيروسات تتطلب وصفة طبية وتكون فعّالة مبكرًا؛ يُفضّل التواصل مع مختص سريعًا إن وُجدت عوامل خطورة أو أعراض شديدة.

conditions.name: Common Cold
medications_Ar: مزيل احتقان (مثل فينيل إفرين/سودوإيفيدرين) عند الملاءمة
conditions.careAdvice: Most colds resolve in 7–10 days. Seek care for high fever, chest pain, shortness of breath, or worsening symptoms.

conditions.name: Migraine
treatments: Rest in a dark, quiet room
treatments_Fr: Repos dans une pièce sombre et calme
medications_Ar: أسيتامينوفين أو مضادات الالتهاب غير الستيرويدية (مثل إيبوبروفين/نابروكسين)
conditions.careAdvice: Triptans and other migraine‑specific medicines require a prescription—see a clinician if attacks are frequent or severe.

conditions.name: Tension Headache
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for sudden severe headache, neurological symptoms, fever, or change in pattern.

conditions.name: Cluster Headache
treatments: Rest in a dark, quiet room
medications: Prescription treatments are typically required (e.g., triptans, high‑flow oxygen)—see a clinician
conditions.careAdvice: Seek medical care for new/severe headaches, neurological symptoms, or change in pattern.

conditions.name: Sinusitis
medications_Fr: Décongestionnant à court terme si approprié
Paracétamol ou ibuprofène pour la douleur
medications_Ar: مزيل احتقان قصير المدى عند الملاءمة
conditions.careAdvice: Most cases are viral. Seek care if symptoms persist >10 days, are severe, or worsen (possible bacterial infection).

conditions.name: Strep Throat
conditions.careAdvice: Testing and antibiotics require a clinician. Do not self‑start antibiotics.
conditions.careAdvice_Fr: Le test et les antibiotiques nécessitent un professionnel. Ne commencez pas d'antibiotiques seul(e).
conditions.careAdvice_Ar: الفحص والمضادات الحيوية تحتاج مختصًا. لا تبدأ المضادات بنفسك.

conditions.name: Bronchitis
conditions.careAdvice: Usually viral; antibiotics generally not needed. Seek care for high fever, shortness of breath, or prolonged symptoms.

conditions.name: Pneumonia
conditions.careAdvice: Seek urgent medical care—pneumonia often requires prescription treatment and monitoring.

conditions.name: COVID-19
conditions.careAdvice: Seek medical care for trouble breathing, chest pain, confusion, or blue lips/face. Antivirals require prescription.
conditions.careAdvice_Fr: Consultez pour dyspnée, douleur thoracique, confusion ou cyanose. Les antiviraux nécessitent une ordonnance.
conditions.careAdvice_Ar: اطلب رعاية عند صعوبة التنفس، ألم صدري، ارتباك، أو ازرقاق الشفاه/الوجه. مضادات الفيروسات بوصفة فقط.

conditions.name: Gastroenteritis
medications: Avoid anti‑diarrheals with high fever/bloody stool
medications_Fr: Sous‑salicylate de bismuth pour diarrhée (si approprié)
medications_Ar: تجنّب مضادات الإسهال مع حرارة مرتفعة/دم
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for signs of dehydration, persistent vomiting, bloody stools, or high fever.
conditions.careAdvice_Fr: Consultez en cas de signes de déshydratation, vomissements persistants, sang dans les selles ou forte fièvre.
conditions.careAdvice_Ar: اطلب رعاية إذا ظهرت علامات الجفاف، قيء مستمر، دم في البراز، أو حرارة مرتفعة.

conditions.name: Food Poisoning
treatments_Fr: Régime léger et fade selon tolérance
treatments_Ar: نظام خفيف غير مهيّج حسب التحمّل
medications: Avoid anti‑diarrheals with high fever/bloody stool
medications_Fr: Sous‑salicylate de bismuth pour diarrhée (si approprié)
Éviter les antidiarrhéiques en cas de forte fièvre/sang
medications_Ar: تجنّب مضادات الإسهال مع حرارة مرتفعة/دم
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for signs of dehydration, persistent vomiting, bloody stools, high fever, or severe abdominal pain.

conditions.name: Irritable Bowel Syndrome
treatments: Low FODMAP diet trial with guidance
treatments_Fr: Essai de régime pauvre en FODMAPs avec encadrement
medications: OTC fiber supplements (e.g., psyllium) for constipation‑predominant IBS
Peppermint oil capsules may help abdominal pain (if appropriate)
medications_Fr: Suppléments de fibres OTC (ex. psyllium) pour IBS à constipation prédominante
Gélules d'huile de menthe poivrée peuvent aider (si approprié)
medications_Ar: مكمّلات ألياف بدون وصفة (مثل بسيليوم) للإمساك الغالب
قد تفيد كبسولات زيت النعناع ألم البطن (عند الملاءمة)
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for weight loss, blood in stool, severe pain, nighttime symptoms, or onset after age 50.

conditions.name: GERD
treatments_Fr: Éviter les aliments déclencheurs (épicés, gras, caféine)
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for alarming symptoms (trouble swallowing, vomiting blood, weight loss, severe chest pain).

conditions.name: Peptic Ulcer
conditions.careAdvice: Evaluation for H. pylori and prescription therapy may be required—see a clinician. Seek urgent care for black/tarry stools or vomiting blood.

conditions.name: Appendicitis
conditions.careAdvice: Do not eat or drink; seek emergency care immediately.

conditions.name: Gallstones
treatments_Fr: Éviter repas copieux/gras pendant les crises
medications_Fr: Antalgiques pour la douleur selon avis
conditions.careAdvice: Seek medical evaluation—some cases require imaging and possible surgery. Urgent care for fever, jaundice, or severe persistent pain.

conditions.name: Pancreatitis
conditions.careAdvice: Call emergency services or go to ER—pancreatitis can be serious and requires clinician management.

conditions.name: Urinary Tract Infection
conditions.careAdvice: Antibiotics require a clinician. Seek urgent care for fever, back pain, or if pregnant.

conditions.name: Kidney Stones
medications: Acetaminophen or ibuprofen for pain if appropriate
medications_Fr: Paracétamol ou ibuprofène pour la douleur si approprié
medications_Ar: أسيتامينوفين أو إيبوبروفين للألم عند الملاءمة
conditions.careAdvice: Seek urgent care for fever, uncontrolled pain, or if symptoms persist—obstruction/infection can be serious.

conditions.name: Otitis Media
conditions.careAdvice: Medical evaluation often needed, especially in children. Seek care for high fever, severe pain, or ear drainage.

conditions.name: Conjunctivitis
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for severe pain, vision changes, light sensitivity, or if symptoms persist/worsen.

conditions.name: Mononucleosis
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for severe abdominal pain (possible spleen issues), trouble breathing, or prolonged high fever.

conditions.name: Chickenpox
treatments: Keep nails short to avoid skin injury
medications: Acetaminophen for fever/pain (avoid aspirin in children/teens)
conditions.careAdvice: Adults, pregnant individuals, or those with weakened immunity should seek medical advice. Watch for skin infection or breathing difficulty.

conditions.name: Shingles
conditions.careAdvice: Antivirals require a prescription and work best within 72 hours—seek care promptly, especially for rash near eyes or severe pain.

conditions.name: Cellulitis
medications: Prescription antibiotics are usually required—do not self‑start antibiotics
conditions.careAdvice: Seek medical care promptly, especially for rapidly spreading redness, high fever, or systemic symptoms.

conditions.name: Lyme Disease
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care if you have an expanding rash or compatible symptoms after tick exposure.

conditions.name: Allergic Rhinitis
conditions.careAdvice: Start with regular saline and antihistamine. Seek advice if symptoms are persistent or severe.
conditions.careAdvice_Fr: Commencez par sérum physiologique régulier et un antihistaminique. Consultez si symptômes persistants/sévères.
conditions.careAdvice_Ar: ابدأ بمحلول ملحي منتظم ومضاد هيستامين. استشر إذا استمرت الأعراض أو كانت شديدة.

conditions.name: Asthma
medications: Rescue inhalers and controllers require prescriptions
conditions.careAdvice: Seek urgent care for severe breathing difficulty. Work with a clinician on long‑term control.

conditions.name: COPD
conditions.careAdvice: Seek urgent care for severe breathing difficulty, blue lips/face, or confusion.

conditions.name: Anxiety
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for persistent anxiety impacting daily life; seek urgent help for thoughts of self‑harm.

conditions.name: Panic Attack
conditions.careAdvice: Rule out medical emergencies; seek care for chest pain, fainting, or first‑time severe symptoms.

conditions.name: Depression
treatments_Fr: Routine régulière et horaires de sommeil
medications: Antidepressants require clinician evaluation and prescription
medications_Fr: Les antidépresseurs nécessitent une évaluation et une ordonnance médicales
medications_Ar: مضادات الاكتئاب تتطلّب تقييمًا ووصفة من مختص
conditions.careAdvice: Seek help for persistent symptoms; seek urgent help immediately for suicidal thoughts (contact local emergency services).

conditions.name: Insomnia
treatments_Fr: Hygiène du sommeil (horaires réguliers, pièce sombre/calme)
Réduire les écrans avant le coucher
treatments_Ar: نظافة نوم جيدة (مواعيد ثابتة، غرفة مظلمة وهادئة)
medications: Short‑term OTC sleep aids are not recommended routinely—consult a clinician if persistent
medications_Fr: Les somnifères OTC à court terme ne sont pas recommandés en routine—consultez si persistant
medications_Ar: لا يُنصح عمومًا بمساعدات النوم بدون وصفة على المدى القصير—استشر إن استمرت المشكلة
conditions.careAdvice: Cognitive behavioral therapy for insomnia (CBT‑I) is effective—seek clinician advice if symptoms persist.

conditions.name: Dehydration
conditions.careAdvice: Seek urgent care for confusion, fainting, very dark urine/minimal urination, or if unable to keep fluids down.

conditions.name: Heat Exhaustion
conditions.careAdvice: If symptoms persist/worsen or mental status changes, seek urgent care—risk of heat stroke.

conditions.name: Heat Stroke
treatments: Emergency cooling (cool water, ice packs at neck/armpits/groin) while awaiting EMS
conditions.careAdvice: Call emergency services immediately—heat stroke is life‑threatening.

conditions.name: Anemia
treatments: Iron‑rich diet (red meat, beans, leafy greens)
medications: Iron supplements if advised by a clinician
conditions.careAdvice: Evaluation is needed to find the cause of anemia; seek care for chest pain, shortness of breath, or fainting.

conditions.name: Iron Deficiency
conditions.careAdvice: Seek evaluation for underlying cause (e.g., blood loss, diet). Avoid self‑supplementation without guidance.

conditions.name: Vitamin D Deficiency
medications: Vitamin D supplements if advised by a clinician
conditions.careAdvice: Testing and dosing guidance are important—seek clinician advice for supplementation.

conditions.name: Hypothyroidism
conditions.careAdvice: See a clinician for testing and individualized treatment; seek care for chest pain or severe symptoms.

conditions.name: Hyperthyroidism
medications: Antithyroid medications and beta‑blockers require prescription
conditions.careAdvice: Seek clinician evaluation for proper diagnosis and therapy; urgent care for chest pain, fainting, or severe palpitations.

conditions.name: Diabetes Type 2
conditions.careAdvice: Home glucose monitoring and clinician guidance are important. Seek urgent care for confusion, severe dehydration, or vomiting.

conditions.name: Hypertension
conditions.careAdvice: Blood pressure medicines are prescription only—see a clinician for diagnosis and a personalized plan. Seek urgent care for chest pain, shortness of breath, confusion, or neurological symptoms (possible hypertensive emergency).
conditions.careAdvice_Fr: Les antihypertenseurs nécessitent une ordonnance—consultez pour un diagnostic et un plan personnalisé. Urgences si douleur thoracique, dyspnée, confusion ou signes neurologiques.
conditions.careAdvice_Ar: أدوية الضغط تحتاج وصفة—استشر مختصًا للتشخيص وخطة علاج شخصية. راجع الطوارئ عند ألم صدري، ضيق نفس، ارتباك، أو أعراض عصبية (قد تكون أزمة ارتفاع ضغط).

conditions.name: Hypotension
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for recurrent fainting, chest pain, shortness of breath, or confusion.

conditions.name: Arrhythmia
medications: Antiarrhythmics and rate/rhythm control medicines require prescription
conditions.careAdvice: Seek urgent care for chest pain, fainting, severe shortness of breath, or sustained palpitations.

conditions.name: Heart Failure
medications: Heart failure medicines (e.g., ACE/ARB/ARNI, beta‑blockers, diuretics) require clinician management
conditions.careAdvice: Seek urgent care for sudden weight gain, severe breathing difficulty, chest pain, or confusion.

conditions.name: Angina
treatments: Rest and avoid exertion during pain
Risk‑factor control (stop smoking, diet, exercise as advised)
medications: Nitroglycerin and other cardiac medicines require prescription
conditions.careAdvice: Chest pain can be an emergency—seek urgent care, especially if new, severe, or with shortness of breath, nausea, or sweating.

conditions.name: Gout
treatments: Limit alcohol and high‑purine foods during flares
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for severe pain, fever, or recurrent attacks—long‑term urate‑lowering therapy requires clinician guidance.

conditions.name: Osteoarthritis
medications: Topical NSAIDs (e.g., diclofenac) and oral acetaminophen/NSAIDs if appropriate
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for severe pain, swelling, or joint instability.

conditions.name: Rheumatoid Arthritis
medications: Disease‑modifying drugs require prescription and monitoring
conditions.careAdvice: Seek rheumatology evaluation for diagnosis and treatment to prevent joint damage.

conditions.name: Sciatica
treatments: Gentle stretching and walking as tolerated
treatments_Fr: Étirements doux et marche selon tolérance
treatments_Ar: تمارين تمدّد لطيفة ومشي حسب التحمّل
medications_Ar: أسيتامينوفين أو مضادات التهاب غير ستيرويدية عند الملاءمة
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for progressive weakness, bowel/bladder changes, or severe persistent pain.
conditions.careAdvice_Fr: Consultez si faiblesse progressive, troubles sphinctériens, ou douleur sévère persistante.
conditions.careAdvice_Ar: استشر عند ضعف متزايد، تغيّرات في التبرّز/التبوّل، أو ألم شديد مستمر.

conditions.name: Low Back Pain
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for red flags: trauma, fever, cancer history, weight loss, neurological deficits, bowel/bladder symptoms.

conditions.name: Neck Strain
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for severe pain, numbness/weakness in arms, or injury/whiplash concerns.

conditions.name: Sprain
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for severe swelling, deformity, inability to bear weight, or suspected fracture.

conditions.name: Carpal Tunnel Syndrome
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for persistent numbness/weakness—additional therapies may be needed.

conditions.name: Dermatitis
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for signs of infection (pus, spreading redness), severe rash, or failure to improve.

conditions.name: Eczema
medications: Topical steroids/calcineurin inhibitors require clinician guidance
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for infected lesions, oozing, or if not improving with moisturizers and gentle skin care.

conditions.name: Psoriasis
medications: Topical steroids/other prescription therapies require clinician guidance
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for widespread disease, joint pain (possible psoriatic arthritis), or if affecting quality of life.

conditions.name: Acne
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for scarring, severe cystic acne, or failure of OTC treatments.

conditions.name: Rosacea
medications: Topical or oral therapies require prescription
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for eye symptoms, thickened skin, or persistent redness/bumps.

conditions.name: Tooth Abscess
medications: Antibiotics and dental procedures require dentist
conditions.careAdvice: Seek urgent dental care—abscesses can spread and may be serious.

conditions.name: Tension Myalgia
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for severe pain, swelling, weakness, or if symptoms persist.

conditions.name: Mononeuropathy
medications: Topical analgesics (e.g., lidocaine) may help localized discomfort
conditions.careAdvice: Seek clinician evaluation for progressive weakness or persistent numbness/pain.

conditions.name: Peripheral Neuropathy
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for wounds, infections, or rapidly worsening symptoms.

conditions.name: Vertigo
medications: Short‑term vestibular suppressants require clinician guidance
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for new severe headache, neurological deficits, hearing loss, or persistent vomiting.

conditions.name: Meniere's Disease
medications: Diuretics and other therapies require clinician guidance
conditions.careAdvice: Seek ENT evaluation for persistent or disabling symptoms.

conditions.name: Tinnitus
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for unilateral tinnitus, hearing loss, or pulsatile tinnitus.

conditions.name: Dry Eye
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for eye pain, light sensitivity, or persistent redness/vision changes.

conditions.name: Allergic Conjunctivitis
medications: Antihistamine eye drops or oral antihistamines
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for eye pain, significant discharge, or vision changes.

conditions.name: Celiac Disease
conditions.careAdvice: Seek dietitian and clinician guidance for diagnosis and long‑term management.

conditions.name: Lactose Intolerance
treatments: Limit lactose or choose lactose‑free products
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care if symptoms persist despite dietary changes—consider other causes.

conditions.name: Ulcerative Colitis
medications: Anti‑inflammatory and immune therapies require prescription
conditions.careAdvice: Seek gastroenterology care for diagnosis and flare management.

conditions.name: Crohn's Disease
medications: Anti‑inflammatory and immune therapies require prescription
conditions.careAdvice: Seek gastroenterology care for diagnosis and treatment; urgent care for severe abdominal pain, fever, or obstruction signs.

conditions.name: PMS
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care if symptoms are severe or significantly impact daily life.

conditions.name: Otitis Externa
medications: Prescription ear drops are often required
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for severe pain, fever, or spreading redness (possible cellulitis).

conditions.name: Sinus Headache
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for high fever, vision changes, severe facial pain, or symptoms >10 days.

conditions.name: Viral Pharyngitis
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for severe pain, drooling/trouble swallowing, high fever, or if symptoms persist.

conditions.name: Bacterial Conjunctivitis
medications_Fr: Les collyres antibiotiques nécessitent une ordonnance
medications_Ar: قطرات عين مضادّة حيوية تتطلب وصفة
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for eye pain, light sensitivity, or vision changes.

conditions.name: Hand Foot and Mouth
treatments: Cold soft foods for mouth pain
treatments_Fr: Aliments froids et mous pour douleur buccale
medications: Acetaminophen or ibuprofen for discomfort (avoid aspirin in children)
medications_Fr: Paracétamol ou ibuprofène pour l'inconfort (éviter l'aspirine chez l'enfant)
medications_Ar: أسيتامينوفين أو إيبوبروفين للانزعاج (تجنّب الأسبرين عند الأطفال)
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for signs of dehydration, persistent high fever, or severe mouth pain.

conditions.name: Whooping Cough
medications: Antibiotics may be prescribed—seek clinician evaluation
medications_Fr: Des antibiotiques peuvent être prescrits—évaluation clinique nécessaire
medications_Ar: قد تُوصف مضادات حيوية—يلزم تقييم سريري
conditions.careAdvice: Infants and pregnant individuals require prompt medical attention. Seek urgent care for breathing difficulty or cyanosis.

conditions.name: Measles
conditions.careAdvice: Seek medical care, especially for infants, pregnant, or immunocompromised individuals; watch for pneumonia or dehydration.

conditions.name: Mumps
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for severe abdominal pain (possible pancreatitis), testicular pain/swelling, or severe headache.

conditions.name: Chlamydia
treatments: Abstain from sex until treated and cleared
medications: Antibiotics require prescription—seek testing and treatment
conditions.careAdvice: Seek clinic testing; untreated infection can cause complications. Urgent care for severe pelvic/testicular pain or fever.

conditions.name: Gonorrhea
treatments: Abstain from sex until treated and cleared
medications: Antibiotics require prescription—seek testing and treatment
conditions.careAdvice: Seek clinic testing promptly; gonorrhea often needs injection therapy. Urgent care for severe pelvic/testicular pain or fever.

conditions.name: Primary Syphilis
treatments: Avoid sexual contact until treated and cleared
medications: Penicillin therapy requires prescription and follow‑up
conditions.careAdvice: Seek clinic testing and treatment; long‑term complications can occur if untreated.

conditions.name: Secondary Syphilis
treatments: Avoid sexual contact until treated and cleared
medications: Penicillin therapy requires prescription and follow‑up
conditions.careAdvice: Seek clinic testing and treatment; monitor for neurologic symptoms.

conditions.name: Genital Herpes
conditions.careAdvice: Seek care for initial outbreak or severe symptoms; discuss suppression therapy if frequent recurrences.

conditions.name: Trichomoniasis
treatments: Abstain from sex until treated and cleared
conditions.careAdvice: Seek clinic testing and treatment.

conditions.name: HPV Genital Warts
medications: Topical therapies or procedures require clinician guidance
conditions.careAdvice: Discuss vaccination and treatment options with a clinician.

conditions.name: Pelvic Inflammatory Disease
treatments: Abstain from sex until treated and cleared
conditions.careAdvice: Urgent care is recommended to prevent complications (e.g., infertility, abscess).

conditions.name: Non-gonococcal Urethritis
treatments: Abstain from sex until treated and cleared
medications: Antibiotics require prescription—seek testing and treatment
conditions.careAdvice: Inform partners as advised; seek care for fever or severe pain.

conditions.name: Acute HIV Infection
treatments: Avoid sexual exposure and needle sharing; seek testing
conditions.careAdvice: Seek testing and prompt medical care; post‑exposure prophylaxis (PEP) may be time‑sensitive for exposures.

conditions.name: Acute Hepatitis B
conditions.careAdvice: Seek medical care for evaluation and monitoring; urgent care for confusion, severe vomiting, or bleeding.

conditions.name: Acute Hepatitis C
conditions.careAdvice: Seek medical care for evaluation; antiviral therapy decisions are clinician‑directed.

conditions.name: Chronic Hepatitis B
treatments: Vaccinate household contacts if not immune
conditions.careAdvice: Regular monitoring by a clinician is important; seek urgent care for confusion, severe vomiting, or bleeding.

conditions.name: Chronic Hepatitis C
treatments: Hepatitis A/B vaccination if not immune
conditions.careAdvice: Evaluation and treatment can cure many cases—seek clinician care for staging and therapy.

conditions.name: Mycoplasma Genitalium Infection
treatments: Abstain from sex until treated and cleared
Inform and treat partners as advised
conditions.careAdvice: Seek clinic testing and follow‑up due to possible antibiotic resistance; urgent care for severe pelvic/testicular pain or fever.
